Walls¶

Get orderbook walls data. Available exchanges: Binance, Combined (FTX + Binance + Binance Futures + Bitmex)

GET /v1/hmc/?key=<YOUR_KEY>

PARAMETERS:

PARAMETER

TYPE

MANDATORY

market

String

YES

exchange

String

YES

timeframe

String

YES

start_date

INT

NO

end_date

INT

NO

above_amount

Float

NO

below_amount

Float

NO

above_price

Float

NO

below_price

Float

NO

market (MANDATORY): Get walls for a specific market /v1/hmc/?key=<YOUR_KEY>&market=<MARKET>. THE ACCEPTED MARKET FORMAT IS COINPAIR: SO BTCUSDT, ETHUSDT, BNBUSDT and so on

exchange (MANDATORY): Choose an exchange. /v1/hmc/?key=<YOUR_KEY>&exchange=<EXCHANGE>.

timeframe (MANDATORY): Choose a timeframe. Available timeframes: 5m, 30m. /v1/hmc/?key=<YOUR_KEY>&timeframe=<TIMEFRAME>.

start_date: Get all the data after a specif timestamp, an integer unix timestamp must be provided. /v1/hmc/?key=<YOUR_KEY>&start_date=<MARKET>.

end_date: Get all the data before a specif timestamp, an integer unix timestamp must be provided. /v1/hmc/?key=<YOUR_KEY>&end_date=<MARKET>.

above_amount: Get all liquidations above a specified amount. /v1/hmc/?key=<YOUR_KEY>&above_amount=<AMOUNT>.

below_amount: Get all liquidations above a specified amount. /v1/hmc/?key=<YOUR_KEY>&below_amount=<AMOUNT>.

above_price: Get all liquidations above a specified price. /v1/hmc/?key=<YOUR_KEY>&above_price=<PRICE>.

below_price: Get all liquidations below a specified price. /v1/hmc/?key=<YOUR_KEY>&below_price=<PRICE>.

Example: /v1/hmc/?key=<YOUR-KEY>&market=BTCUSDT&exchange=binance&timeframe=30m.

{"count":66713,"next":"http://51.79.25.135/v1/hmc/?exchange=binance&key=<YOUR-KEY>&market=BTCUSDT&page=2&timeframe=30m","previous":null,"results":[{"UTCunix":1605025800,"price":15500.0,"amount":257.00074,"candle":"2020-11-10T16:30:00Z", "exchange":null}, {"UTCunix":1605025800,"price":14800.0,"amount":201.75888,"candle":"2020-11-10T16:30:00Z", "exchange":null} ... ]

UTCunix: It’s the specific timestamp at which the wall showed up in the orderbook.

Price: Rate of the wall.

Amount: Amount of the wall.

Candle: Timestamp of the candle at which the wall showed up in the orderbook.
